text: Shopify bohat saari free themes deta hai.  In mein se koi ek select kar lein apne online store ke liye.
Free aur paid themes mein fark kya hai?  Features aur customization options check karein.
Apni pasand ki theme select karne ke baad, usay apne business ke hisab se customize karein.  Logo, colors, aur images add karein.
Ab apka Shopify store ready hai launch hone ke liye!  Apni products add karein aur apna online business start karein!
